languages.text: Долгий и подробный отчет техноматов можно было сократить до одной, самой главной мысли — несмотря на странное поведение сервиторов, они все еще способны выполнять свои задачи, а потому их ликвидация не являлась необходимостью.

traits.locale_text: Долгий и подробный отчет техноматов можно было сократить до одной, самой главной мысли — несмотря на странное поведение сервиторов, они все еще способны выполнять свои задачи, а потому их ликвидация не являлась необходимостью.

languages.text: The technomats' long-winded and detailed report could have been summarised in a single key point: despite the servitors' abnormal behaviour, they were still quite capable of carrying out tasks, and therefore the circumstances did not call for their termination.
languages.original_text: Долгий и подробный отчет техноматов можно было сократить до одной, самой главной мысли — несмотря на странное поведение сервиторов, они все еще способны выполнять свои задачи, а потому их ликвидация не являлась необходимостью.

traits.locale_text: The technomats' long-winded and detailed report could have been summarised in a single key point: despite the servitors' abnormal behaviour, they were still quite capable of carrying out tasks, and therefore the circumstances did not call for their termination.

The technomats' long-winded and detailed report could have been summarised in a single key point: despite the servitors' abnormal behaviour, they were still quite capable of carrying out tasks, and therefore the circumstances did not call for their termination.

The technomats' long-winded and detailed report could have been summarised in a single key point: despite the servitors' abnormal behaviour, they were still quite capable of carrying out tasks, and therefore the circumstances did not call for their termination.

The technomats' long-winded and detailed report could have been summarised in a single key point: despite the servitors' abnormal behaviour, they were still quite capable of carrying out tasks, and therefore the circumstances did not call for their termination.

languages.text: テクノマットの長ったらしい詳細なレポートは、要点をまとめて伝えることもできた。サーヴィターの異常な行動にもかかわらず、彼らは依然として任務を遂行する能力を持っていた。つまり、彼らは状況に影響されることはなかった。
languages.original_text: The technomats' long-winded and detailed report could have been summarised in a single key point: despite the servitors' abnormal behaviour, they were still quite capable of carrying out tasks, and therefore the circumstances did not call for their termination.

traits.locale_text: テクノマットの長ったらしい詳細なレポートは、要点をまとめて伝えることもできた。サーヴィターの異常な行動にもかかわらず、彼らは依然として任務を遂行する能力を持っていた。つまり、彼らは状況に影響されることはなかった。

languages.text: Les technomates auraient pu résumer leur rapport aussi détaillé qu'interminable en un seul point : malgré leur comportement anormal, les servitors étaient toujours capables d'effectuer les tâches qui leur étaient attribuées. Par conséquent, il n'était pas nécessaire de les éliminer.
languages.original_text: The technomats' long-winded and detailed report could have been summarised in a single key point: despite the servitors' abnormal behaviour, they were still quite capable of carrying out tasks, and therefore the circumstances did not call for their termination.

traits.locale_text: Les technomates auraient pu résumer leur rapport aussi détaillé qu'interminable en un seul point : malgré leur comportement anormal, les servitors étaient toujours capables d'effectuer les tâches qui leur étaient attribuées. Par conséquent, il n'était pas nécessaire de les éliminer.

languages.text: 技工提交了冗长而详细的报告，简而言之就是：尽管这些机仆出现了行为异常，但他们仍然有能力行任务。因此在这种情况下，不需要终止他们的功能。
languages.original_text: The technomats' long-winded and detailed report could have been summarised in a single key point: despite the servitors' abnormal behaviour, they were still quite capable of carrying out tasks, and therefore the circumstances did not call for their termination.

traits.locale_text: 技工提交了冗长而详细的报告，简而言之就是：尽管这些奴工出现了行为异常，但他们仍然有能力行任务。因此在这种情况下，不需要终止他们的功能。

languages.text: El informe extenso y detallado de los tecnómatas podría haberse resumido en una frase: a pesar del comportamiento anómalo de los servidores, seguían siendo capaces de realizar sus tareas, por lo que las circunstancias no requerían su eliminación.
languages.original_text: The technomats' long-winded and detailed report could have been summarised in a single key point: despite the servitors' abnormal behaviour, they were still quite capable of carrying out tasks, and therefore the circumstances did not call for their termination.

traits.locale_text: El informe extenso y detallado de los tecnómatas podría haberse resumido en una frase: a pesar del comportamiento anómalo de los servidores, seguían siendo capaces de realizar sus tareas, por lo que las circunstancias no requerían su eliminación.

languages.text: Der langatmige und detaillierte Bericht der Technomaten hätte auf einen zentralen Punkt zusammengekürzt werden können: Trotz des abnormalen Verhaltens der Servitoren waren sie noch immer in der Lage, Aufgaben zu erfüllen. Eine Terminierung war daher nicht nötig.
languages.original_text: The technomats' long-winded and detailed report could have been summarised in a single key point: despite the servitors' abnormal behaviour, they were still quite capable of carrying out tasks, and therefore the circumstances did not call for their termination.

traits.locale_text: Der langatmige und detaillierte Bericht der Technomaten hätte auf einen zentralen Punkt zusammengekürzt werden können: Trotz des abnormalen Verhaltens der Servitoren waren sie noch immer in der Lage, Aufgaben zu erfüllen. Eine Terminierung war daher nicht nötig.

languages.text: Teknomatların uzun uzadıya ve ayrıntılarıyla bildirdiği rapor, tek bir kilit noktada özetlenebilir: Hizmetörler, tuhaf davranışlarına rağmen verilen emirleri uygulayabiliyordu. Yani bu durumda görevlerine son verilmesi için bir sebep yoktu.
languages.original_text: The technomats' long-winded and detailed report could have been summarised in a single key point: despite the servitors' abnormal behaviour, they were still quite capable of carrying out tasks, and therefore the circumstances did not call for their termination.

traits.locale_text: Teknomatların uzun uzadıya ve ayrıntılarıyla bildirdiği rapor, tek bir kilit noktada özetlenebilirdi: Hizmetörler, tuhaf davranışlarına rağmen verilen emirleri uygulayabiliyordu. Yani bu durumda görevlerine son verilmesi için bir sebep yoktu.
